Job Description: Roles and ResponsibilitiesMain Duties and Responsibilities : The incumbent should have an in-depth working knowledge in software development area with a minimum of 2-7 years experience. The incumbent should have a relevant qualification. The primary responsibilities will include : - Developing software as per requirements from clients/Pre-sales teams- Deployment of software on client site- Support and maintenance of software- Assuming additional duties as requested or assigned Desirable Skills - Self-motivated with willingness to complete a variety of projects with limited supervision in a timely manner.- Excellent interpersonal, written and verbal communications skills.- Strong organizational skills, professional demeanour and behaviour. - Excellent problem solving and analytical skills that allow one to proactively anticipate requirements and potential problems.Technical knowledge(Mandatory) :- Hands on experience in HTML/JavaScript/CSS- Expertise in RDBMS/SQL/(Any one of SQL Server/Oracle/DB2/MySQL)- Good knowledge of technical architecture- Must have worked on .NET or J2E frameworkGood to have skills :- Exposure to Agile methodology- NLP & Python Educational Qualification : Candidates should be B.E./B.Tech in Computer sciencePlease apply here.
